text: Our latest weekly curated jobs roundup from the Archinect Job board includes eight architecture firms and one gallery with Marketing and Office Administration job opportunities in New York City. For helpful guidance on how to get that next job, make sure to check out Archinect's Guide to Job Titles series and our Archinect Tips collection. Rafael Viñoly Architects seeks a Social Media Producer"We are seeking a highly creative and motivated Social Media Producer to join our dynamic architecture firm. The ideal candidate will be passionate about architecture, design, and storytelling, with a strong grasp of social media platforms and video editing techniques. This position involves producing engaging video content that showcases the firm's projects, behind-the-scenes processes, team culture, and industry insights. You will be responsible for creating visually compelling content and writing social media captions that aligns with our brand's voice and enhances our online presence." Tokyo International Forum by Rafael Viñoly Architects.FXCollaborative seeks a Senior Marketing & Communications Coordinator"We are currently seeking a talented and enthusiastic Senior Marketing & Communications Coordinator. The Senior Marketing & Communications Coordinator will support the Marketing & Communications group, leadership, and the firm's PR agency with strategic pursuits and both external and internal communications. In addition, they will help to craft, edit, and create a variety of marketing materials, ensuring the firm's message is consistent across all materials, including print and digital media." PEI Architects seeks a Marketing/Business Development Lead"The Marketing/Business Development Manager is responsible for internal marketing support and productive and successful business development efforts." Qualifications include ten or more years of related experience, graphic design skills, and experience with Adobe Creative Suite, particularly with InDesign. Applicants should also be able to work both independently and with a team, as well as possess strong verbal and written communication skills. Chateau-Lynch Bages by PEI Architects.Blair + Mui Dowd Architects seeks a Marketing Coordinator"We are currently seeking a talented and enthusiastic Marketing Coordinator. The Marketing Coordinator will support the firm’s leadership with strategic pursuits and both external and internal communications. In addition, they will help to create and edit a variety of marketing materials, ensuring the firm's message is consistent across all mediums. The marketing coordinator will work with firm principals to enhance the firm’s visibility through publications, social media, website updates, presentations, and design awards." di Domenico + Partners seeks a Marketing Manager"This is a hands-on role, requiring direct involvement in all marketing tasks. Strong communication, writing/editing, and organizational skills, along with proficiency in Word/Excel/InDesign/PowerPoint are required. Experience in the AEC industry is preferred. Must be detail oriented." METRO Silver Line Extension by di Domenico + Partners.Baird Architects seeks an Executive Assistant"The Executive Assistant position requires an organized and detail-oriented individual with a passion for Art, Architecture, and the Environment and an interest in learning about the operation and management of a design-driven architectural practice. The ideal candidate is self-motivated and can assist the Founding Principal with executive administration, contracts, scheduling, travel, and planning. This is a key employee who serves as the nexus of communication amongst firm architects and the Founder." The firm is also hiring for a Senior Project Architect, an Architectural Designer, and a Summer Intern in New York City. Dattner Architects seeks a Marketing Coordinator"We are currently searching for an experienced Marketing Coordinator to join our award-winning Marketing Department. The selected candidate will develop and coordinate marketing initiatives including proposals, presentations, social media, print and digital marketing material, award submissions, website maintenance, and often a combination of these. They will be a key partner in maintaining day-to-day operations of the Department. Our marketing coordinators work together and independently, often directly with firm leadership as well as design staff to bring marketing efforts to realization." The firm is also hiring for a number of other roles. Manhattan Districts 1/2/5 Garage by Dattner Architects.Mark Jupiter seeks an Executive Assistant to the FounderQualifications include a strong work ethic and self-motivated mindset, exceptional verbal and written communication skills, a high level of organization, attention to detail, the ability to work in a fast-paced environment, and out-of-the-box thinking skills. Experience with Adobe Creative Suite is a plus. The firm is also hiring for an Associate Project Manager in Brooklyn. Antiga Galeria seeks a Gallery Assistant"This role supports the soon to be launched antique, vintage, and custom furniture gallery’s operations and creative endeavors with the two founders. The role entails working closely with ownership to manage inventory, sales, marketing, client relations, and custom furniture projects. Collaboration with ownership is central to all responsibilities, ensuring alignment with the gallery’s vision and goals." Additional qualifications include five-plus years of experience and proficiency with AutoCAD, Adobe Creative Suite, Microsoft Office, and Mailchimp. html:
Our latest weekly curated jobs roundup from the Archinect Job board includes eight architecture firms and one gallery with Marketing and Office Administration job opportunities in New York City.

For helpful guidance on how to get that next job, make sure to check out Archinect's Guide to Job Titles series and our Archinect Tips collection.

Rafael Viñoly Architects seeks a Social Media Producer
"We are seeking a highly creative and motivated Social Media Producer to join our dynamic architecture firm. The ideal candidate will be passionate about architecture, design, and storytelling, with a strong grasp of social media platforms and video editing techniques. This position involves producing engaging video content that showcases the firm's projects, behind-the-scenes processes, team culture, and industry insights. You will be responsible for creating visually compelling content and writing social media captions that aligns with our brand's voice and enhances our online presence."

FXCollaborative seeks a Senior Marketing & Communications Coordinator
"We are currently seeking a talented and enthusiastic Senior Marketing & Communications Coordinator. The Senior Marketing & Communications Coordinator will support the Marketing & Communications group, leadership, and the firm's PR agency with strategic pursuits and both external and internal communications. In addition, they will help to craft, edit, and create a variety of marketing materials, ensuring the firm's message is consistent across all materials, including print and digital media."

PEI Architects seeks a Marketing/Business Development Lead
"The Marketing/Business Development Manager is responsible for internal marketing support and productive and successful business development efforts." Qualifications include ten or more years of related experience, graphic design skills, and experience with Adobe Creative Suite, particularly with InDesign. Applicants should also be able to work both independently and with a team, as well as possess strong verbal and written communication skills.

Blair + Mui Dowd Architects seeks a Marketing Coordinator
"We are currently seeking a talented and enthusiastic Marketing Coordinator. The Marketing Coordinator will support the firm’s leadership with strategic pursuits and both external and internal communications. In addition, they will help to create and edit a variety of marketing materials, ensuring the firm's message is consistent across all mediums. The marketing coordinator will work with firm principals to enhance the firm’s visibility through publications, social media, website updates, presentations, and design awards."

di Domenico + Partners seeks a Marketing Manager
"This is a hands-on role, requiring direct involvement in all marketing tasks. Strong communication, writing/editing, and organizational skills, along with proficiency in Word/Excel/InDesign/PowerPoint are required. Experience in the AEC industry is preferred. Must be detail oriented."

Baird Architects seeks an Executive Assistant
"The Executive Assistant position requires an organized and detail-oriented individual with a passion for Art, Architecture, and the Environment and an interest in learning about the operation and management of a design-driven architectural practice. The ideal candidate is self-motivated and can assist the Founding Principal with executive administration, contracts, scheduling, travel, and planning. This is a key employee who serves as the nexus of communication amongst firm architects and the Founder."

The firm is also hiring for a Senior Project Architect, an Architectural Designer, and a Summer Intern in New York City.

Dattner Architects seeks a Marketing Coordinator
"We are currently searching for an experienced Marketing Coordinator to join our award-winning Marketing Department. The selected candidate will develop and coordinate marketing initiatives including proposals, presentations, social media, print and digital marketing material, award submissions, website maintenance, and often a combination of these. They will be a key partner in maintaining day-to-day operations of the Department. Our marketing coordinators work together and independently, often directly with firm leadership as well as design staff to bring marketing efforts to realization."

The firm is also hiring for a number of other roles.

Mark Jupiter seeks an Executive Assistant to the Founder
Qualifications include a strong work ethic and self-motivated mindset, exceptional verbal and written communication skills, a high level of organization, attention to detail, the ability to work in a fast-paced environment, and out-of-the-box thinking skills. Experience with Adobe Creative Suite is a plus.

The firm is also hiring for an Associate Project Manager in Brooklyn.

Antiga Galeria seeks a Gallery Assistant
"This role supports the soon to be launched antique, vintage, and custom furniture gallery’s operations and creative endeavors with the two founders. The role entails working closely with ownership to manage inventory, sales, marketing, client relations, and custom furniture projects. Collaboration with ownership is central to all responsibilities, ensuring alignment with the gallery’s vision and goals." Additional qualifications include five-plus years of experience and proficiency with AutoCAD, Adobe Creative Suite, Microsoft Office, and Mailchimp.

If you don't already, follow Archinect on Facebook, X, Instagram, Pinterest, Linkedin, and Threads, as well as on our dedicated Archinect Jobs Facebook, X, Instagram, and Threads feeds.
